attributes.action: UK referendum to validate Scotland's independence.
attributes.additional_details: That the terms of any agreement for Scotland to leave the Union be subject to the approval in a referendum of the whole of the UK electorate so that if the people of Scotland vote for independence then the financial and other terms are not disproportionately disadvantageous to one country or the other. We object to any part of the UK being taken from the people without their express informed consent.
